page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN TILSTON
page.content: There is very little in the way of entertainment in the locality although there is an active{Theatre Group}who put on a production twice a year which is well attended. The local primary school put on an annual{Christmas {Concert}which is also very well supported. The village hall is the venue for discos, dances & the various village clubs. There are two local ladies choirs , Tilston ladies choir and the W.I. entertainers. There is an {annual fair}which attends the{Wakes {weekend}in August.(see {EVENTS}& {CUSTOMS IN TILSTON}) The nearest theatres are at{Chester, Mold & Crewe. {Chester}holds an annual music festival. Trips are also arranged to theatres in Liverpool and Manchester to see pantomimes and shows. The nearest{cinemas}are in Wrexham and Chester.
